Name: Light
About the game: Play as a flaming ball of light bouncing off walls and other players. This game challenges your reaction, and prediction speed. See if you're faster enough to move against your opponent Or if you can determine where you opponent will move nest. This game currently only takes place in space. Within Light there are several different stages to choose from with different game modes. Missions Follow a basic but somewhat funny story of a light source and their invisible companion as they fight through space~ Targets Break through targets within a 2 minutes timer. VS Fight against other players or computers and improve your skills within the game itself!
